config_ios.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Application uses the microphone to create voice messages in chat.
config_ios.NSCameraUsageDescription: Application uses the camera so you can take a photo and publish it in the feed.
config_ios.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Application uses the photo gallery so you can choose photos from the gallery to publish in your feed.
config_ios.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app requires access to the contacts to invite them to Bastyon.
